title: Design Thinking-Based Mathematics Creativity Development Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational mathematics pedagogy and interest in creative problem-solving
context.additional_context: Targets learners aiming to enhance mathematics teaching competencies as current practitioners. Applies collaborative and design thinking processes using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Development of creative mathematics lesson designs utilizing the five-stage design thinking process (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test).
Improvement of lesson design creativity (originality, flexibility, elaboration) by over 30% through peer assessment.
Completion of two or more mathematics problem-solving projects using collaboration tools in a PBL environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
